item.description:
Just for fun and inspiration!  Goddess evening for your inspiration, revelation, higher guidance, fun, fantasy and connection with human and angelic community. 

In a sacred circle, we will enter ceremony and deep meditation. Surrounded with high vibration music and light chanting, we will call in the celestial beings specifically to aid our inner powers to access intuition and guidance. The celestial beings are always there, your guidance is always there, but with the power of our divine intentions and our divination tools, we will have access to sacred intuition to point the way toward our purposeful next steps on this amazing soul's journey. 

Judy will provide many decks of divination cards: Angels, Archangels, Fairies, Hidden Realms, Mary Magdelene, John Holland, Grace Deck, Power Animals ....as well as Runes and Pendulums.  Best of all, bring whatever decks and tools YOU have..to add to the mix.  The tools will be spread around a sacred alter in the middle of the floor. Cushions provided!  
    Bring a journal to write down your inspirations and intuitions. Be prepared to have fun, laugh and be in community with angels, both human and cosmic! Bring your questions!
   Everyone who attends will receive the Seers Rite - one of the foundation Rites of the Munay-Ki...to allow us to receive intuition from the eyes of the heart.  (Munay-Ki.org)
item.name: Goddess Divination Evening
